Product Title: Electric Shavers for Women, 4 in 1 Ladies Cordless Rechargeable Painless Hair Remover for Eyebrows, Nasal Hair, Underarms, Bikini Area and Whole Body- Safe, Gentle Shaving Razor Systems -Pink Gold …

Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Batteries': '1 AA batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '666354185604'}
Review Text: It seems you should go in one direction or it will pull the hair a bit.  In the other direction (you'll have to discover which way for your self), it is completely painless.  Even in the 'wrong' direction, it's not bad and I'm not super pain tolerant. Needs no batteries, so that's great, too.
Review Title: So far, so good
Rating: 5.0

Does not go deep enough for the dye to be ...
R RACILY HAIR Racily Hair 8A Ombre Brazilian Hair 3/4 Bundles Kinky Curly Unprocessed Virgin Brazilian Hair Black to Dark Brown 2 Tone #1B 30 Curly Weave Human Hair (14" 16" 18")
{'Color': 'Brown', 'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Installation Type': 'Sew-In', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13 x 8 x 2 inches; 12 Ounces', 'UPC': '718040918840'}
Will definitely order again.  Longer next time.  This time, I got the 14,16,18. The color is gorgeous and a true 30 color.  I did lightly bleach it to bring that ombre 30 higher/closer to the weft (I wanted the lighter color closer to my eye area and not just on the bottom half of the hair. I attached photos to show how the curl pattern was affected by the bleach (deep curl pattern still in effect, just went from a deep 4a to a 3b/3c (see the third pic).  In that 3rd pic, the first piece of hair is out of the pack, not washed or dyed; the second piece of hair is the bleached portion, and the third piece is just cowashed.  You can see beautiful curls in all three parts, so feel free to wash or bleach, the curls seem to be here to stay. Lastly, the length is very true (slightly longer, actually).
Yes, yes, yes!!!!!  I hope this seller stays in business 4ever!
Fengde Hair 8A Ombre Brazilian Deep Wave Virgin Hair One Bundle 100% Unprocessed Human Hair Extensions(24,1B/30)
NewRang

Will definitely order again. Longer next time. This time, I got the 14,16,18. The color is gorgeous and a true 30 color. I did lightly bleach it to bring that ombre 30 higher/closer to the weft (I wanted the lighter color closer to my eye area and not just on the bottom half of the hair. I attached photos to show how the curl pattern was affected by the bleach (deep curl pattern still in effect, just went from a jerry-4a to a 3b/3c (see the first and second pics). In that 2nd pic, the first section of hair is out of the pack, not washed or dyed; the second section of hair is the bleached portion, and the third piece is not bleached, only just cowashed. You can see beautiful curls in all three section, so feel free to wash or bleach (be careful, though), the curls seem to be here to stay. Lastly, the length is very true (slightly longer, actually).
Yes, yes, yes!!!!! I hope this seller stays in business 4ever! Wish I could order single bundles...

BEYELIAN Premade Ultra Volume Eyelash Extensions 8D 0.07mm 10mm C Curl Express Cluster Lash Extensions
BEYELIAN
{'Brand': 'BEYELIAN', 'Material': 'Polyester, Polybutylene Terephthalate Fiber', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '4.7 x 1.96 x 0.39 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Individual', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.7 x 1.96 x 0.39 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'UPC': '712022597757'}
Was disappointed at first sight because of how thin the individual lashes used to make the clusters were...until I put them on. They do not fail to fan out and quickly make themselves known.  Being so light keeps them from weighing down my own fragile lashes, which is a good thing.  I do have that glam look now and plan to keep that way...until I get bored.
Will buy again.

profile:
**User Summary:**

The user exhibits a strong fondness for floral-themed and vibrant decorative accessories in hair styling while actively seeking high-quality beauty tools to elevate their personal appearance. Their focus remains on practical solutions for hair care. They continue to show interest in celebratory items appropriate for weddings and birthdays, highlighting their passion for creative expression and preference for visually appealing designs.

Recently, the user has explored grooming tools, as seen in their purchase of a multi-functional hair remover. Their review of this product reflects a balanced perspective, as they appreciated its painless operation in the correct direction but noted a slight discomfort when used incorrectly. This indicates their discerning approach to quality and effectiveness.

The user’s commitment to high standards in beauty products shines through, whether it’s for hair care or grooming. They favor sophisticated items that enhance their grooming routine, consistently prioritizing quality and practicality. Their experiences with beauty products showcase a blend of cautious optimism, as they remain open to trying new solutions while holding their established favorites to a high standard. Overall, the user emphasizes quality, versatility, and personal style in their beauty regimen, continuously refining their aesthetic for social events.
